title.narrative: DBP MMP Agro Industries and Danish Technological Institute (DTI)

description.narrative: The objective of the partnership is to develop and upscale vegetable oil production in order to meet the growing demand of the product in the East African market. In order to meet the growing local demand for vegetable oil and to establish a basis for future exports, MMP Agro Industries Limited would like to exploit its vast experience and current position in the cotton value chain by up scaling the production of cotton seed, sunflower and soya beans. To ensure security of raw material supply, the company is proposing to mobilise and support local farmers in growing these oil seeds in Northern Uganda. The farmers will have a guaranteed market for the oil seeds and MMP Agro Industries will pay them a good price to ensure that they continue growing the crops.
